stdout:
Table	Create Table
seoArticleJobs	CREATE TABLE `seoArticleJobs` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `theme` varchar(500) NOT NULL,
  `targetWordCount` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `authorName` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('pending','processing','completed','failed','cancelled') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `currentStep` int(11) DEFAULT '1',
  `progress` int(11) DEFAULT '0',
  `keywords` longtext DEFAULT NULL,
  `analyses` longtext DEFAULT NULL,
  `criteria` longtext DEFAULT NULL,
  `structure` longtext DEFAULT NULL,
  `article` longtext DEFAULT NULL,
  `qualityCheck` longtext DEFAULT NULL,
  `errorMessage` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `autoEnhance` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0: manual, 1: auto-enhance after generation',
  `batchId` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Batch ID for CSV batch processing',
  `completedAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Completion timestamp',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin AUTO_INCREMENT=1020001
